title: 【求助】电脑用pocketmine开服外网连不起
txt_content:
电脑开服成功服务器配置OK
#Properties Config file
#Mon Aug 17 08:54:47 AWST 2015
server-name=Enjoy's server
server-port=90
memory-limit=256M
gamemode=0
max-players=10
spawn-protection=16
white-list=off
enable-query=on
enable-rcon=on
send-usage=on
description=Server made using PocketMine-MP
motd=Welcome @Player to this server!
server-ip=10.35.17.60
server-type=normal
last-update=
announce-player-achievements=on
view-distance=10
allow-flight=on
spawn-animals=on
spawn-mobs=on
hardcore=off
pvp=on
difficulty=3
generator-settings=on
level-name=world
level-seed=
level-type=DEFAULT
rcon.password=i+vdigPzoP
auto-save=on
upnp-forwarding=on
force-gamemode=off
端口配置OK
但是外网手机连接失败
求大神
{:10_512:}

replies.author: 酱瓜
replies.txt_content: 用 轻步云映射 映射试试……我以前开服也是路由映射无效……用软件才行……

replies.author: dwclqz
replies.txt_content: 你有一个地方搞错了类型不是tcp，是udp，你试试。
